info.description: Processor debug commands. Available only after emulation has been started.

run.help: Run processor until break or stop

usage:
Syntax: r <reg> OR r <reg> <op> <val> OR r <reg> <op> <reg>
sp, sd1, sd2 semantics are supported for reg name.
Value can be decimal, or hex with '0x' prefix.
Possible operations are: = + - * / | & ^ << >>
Examples of use: r sp
                 r r3 = 12
                 r r7 | 0x8020
                 r msr
                 r hid2 | 2
                 r r7 = sd1

CacheDebugDisable.help: Disable cache emulation despite Gekko register settings
